siteDescription: Steven Leabo Web Developer from upstate new york in Syracuse area
about: I'm a web developer from Anytown, USA. I like to build things with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

projects.about: Full website redesign and development for Anaren Inc. using Drupal 7.  This project included a custom theme, custom modules, and custom views.  The site also includes DataTables for Anaren's vast product catalog.
projects.type: Drupal, PHP, MySQL, HTML, CSS, DataTables
